Package gamecomponents.people

Class Doctor

java.lang.Object
display.GameComponent
gamecomponents.people.Person
gamecomponents.people.Doctor
public class Doctor
extends Person
The Doctor class represents a Person that is immune to Covid and can be used to create Hospitals.
Author:
Felicia Zhang
